naslov: Pakoštane, stambeno-poslovna zgrada u samom centru naselja, 620 m2 (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Pakoštane, prostrana samostojeća stambeno-poslovna kuća bruto stambene površine od 620 m², na četiri etaže, na zemljišnoj čestici od 310 m². U suterenu se nalazi garaža koja može primiti 6-7 vozila te dvije ostave/spremišta od 27 m2. Tu su i 7 WC-a koji opslužuju okolne poslovne prostore. U prizemlju su smještene dvije poslovne jedinice s po 3 i 4 poslovne prostorije, svaka s preko 70 m2 poslovnog prostora te još 3 dodatna WC-a. Prvi kat čine dvije stambene jedinice – jedan jednosobni stan i jedna garsonijera. Na drugom se katu prostire još jedan, dvosobni stan, te izuzetno izdašna terasa. Donje dvije poslovne etaže su u roh-bau stanju, na prvoj etaži jednosobni stan je dovršen i namješten, garsonijera je u roh-bau stanju dok je stan na drugoj etaži također dovršen i namješten. Svaki stan posjeduje zaseban klima uređaj, a tu su i bežični internet, satelitska televizija, roštilj te vrtna garnitura. Pripremljene su i provedene cijevi za centralno grijanje. Preko puta nekretnine je javni parking. Nekretnina se nalazi na iznimno atraktivnoj lokaciji u samom centru Pakoštana, doslovno nadohvat ruke svim dodatnih sadržajima. Vrlo je blizu mora i plaže i krasi je lijepi pogled na južni dio Pašmanskog kanala i obližnje otoke. Vlasništvo je uredno, papiri su čisti, a nekretnina pruža pregršt opcija stambene, poslovne, ugostiteljske, trgovačke, uslužne i turističke prirode po više nego privlačnoj cijeni. --- Pakoštane, a spacious detached residential and commercial building with a gross living area of 620 m², over four floors, on the land plot of 310 m². In the basement lies a garage that can accommodate 6-7 vehicles and two storage rooms of 27 m2. There are also 7 toilets there that serve the surrounding business premises. On the ground floor are located two business units with 3 and 4 business rooms, each consisting of over 70 m2 of business space, and 3 additional toilets. The first floor consists of two residential units – a one-room apartment and a studio apartment. On the second floor is situated another two-room apartment and an extremely generous terrace. The lower two business floors are in roh-bau condition, on the first floor the one-room apartment is completed and furnished, the studio is in roh-bau condition, while the apartment on the second floor is also finished and appointed. Each apartment has its own air conditioning unit, and there is wireless internet, satellite television, barbecue and garden table and chairs available. Pipes for central heating were prepared and installed. Across the street from the property is a public parking lot. The property is located in an extremely attractive location in the very center of Pakoštane, literally next to all additional amenities. It is also very close to the sea and the beach and features a very nice view of the southern part of the Pašman channel and nearby islands. The ownership is orderly, the papers are clean, and the property offers a handful of residential, business, catering, commercial, service and tourist options at a more than tempting price.
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Etažno centralno na struju
